description.brief: A simple library to load image files as SDL surfaces

package.description:
The SDL_image library can load images of various formats as SDL surfaces. This library supports BMP, PNM (PPM/PGM/PBM), XBM, LBM, PCX, GIF, JPEG, PNG, TGA, and TIFF formats.
This ROS package is just a wrapper for the standard SDL_image distribution, to allow automatic installation using ROS dependency generation. It does not change the SDL_image library in any way. Any specific questions about broken automatic ROS build scripts should be directed at the ROS package maintainer not the SDL_image authors.
package.author: Sam Lantinga, Mattias Engdegard, and many contributors. See the CHANGES file in the distribution or the project web page for full credits.
